name: Galactic Incoming
description: We all love a classic shoot-em-up game. Well, here's one for you, Retro Style. Shoot those Aliens with all that you got.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 64-Bit Processor: Intel i3 or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics 4600 or better Storage: 25 MB available space
